#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

start_sources()
# -- cryosvr.waf_files --
sources_platform(ALL)
add_sources("CryOSVR_uber_0.cpp"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Interface"
		"../Interface/IHmdOsvrDevice.h"
		"../Interface/IOsvrPlugin.h"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Root"
		"PluginDll.cpp"
		"PluginDll.h"
		"OsvrDevice.cpp"
		"OsvrDevice.h"
		"OsvrResources.cpp"
		"OsvrResources.h"
		"resource.h"
		"StdAfx.cpp"
		"StdAfx.h"
)

add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Root"
		"StdAfx.cpp"
)

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

if (WINDOWS)
	CryEngineModule(CryOSVR PCH "StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryPlugins")

	target_include_directories( ${THIS_PROJECT}
	PRIVATE
		"${CRYENGINE_DIR}/Code/SDKs/OSVR/include"
		"${CRYENGINE_DIR}/Code/CryEngine/CryCommon"
	PUBLIC
		../Interface
	)

	find_library(osvrClientKit osvrClientKit PATHS "${SDK_DIR}/OSVR/lib")
	find_library(osvrRenderManager osvrRenderManager PATHS "${SDK_DIR}/OSVR/lib")
	target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE "${osvrClientKit}" "${osvrRenderManager}")
endif()
